meanings.definition: Yulans: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The yulans in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some yulans in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The yulans in the park seemed to be gossiping with the tulips.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and colorful as a field of yulans.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the yulans filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Yulans: the plural form of yulan, referring to multiple plants of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The yulans in the botanical garden were a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of yulans growing by the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The yulans in the yard were having a party with the daisies.
meanings.sent4: The field of yulans swayed gently in the breeze like a sea of flowers.
meanings.sent5: The yulans stood tall and proud among the other plants.
